text: The Bitter End Yacht Club (BEYC) founded in 1973 is located in the protected North Sound of Virgin Gorda in the British Virgin Islands (BVI). The resort is only accessible by boat. According to their website BEYC has been awarded the Trip Advisor Certificate of Excellence in 2013 & 2015\. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1973 establishments in the British Empire Category:Yacht clubs in North America Category:Virgin Gorda Category:Water transport in the British Virgin Islands Category:Yacht clubs in the United Kingdom
title: Bitter End Yacht Club
